caption.title: Concentrations and total amounts of IgG isolated from paired saliva and plasma samples.
caption.p: Final volume of saliva IgG isolate was 35μL, final volume of plasma IgG isolate was 100μL. Average IgG yield was 5.3μg (range 1.7–12.5μg) from 2mL of saliva and 54.8μg (range 40–76.45μg) from 15μL of plasma.
Click here for additional data file.
